patthana15.42:1.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.42:2.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
